title: God

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- During the night, you can chose to *Smite* everyone, dealing a Basic attack to the entire town.
- You may only *smite* once at the beginning of the game.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Each full moon, your attack level rises by 1.
- You get another *smite* at round 7.

desc:
